page.title: 07FARMING
page.content:
The Flushing farm is made up by 3 diffrent farms .The land is mainly tended ,although there are about 2 or 3 acres of woodland which is not used ,(they are not cut and sold for timber ).The following is a list of the farms,their owners,the acreage,and their crops and livestock:
Trefusis Barton _ Mr Rex Laity, 250acres, dairy cattle, beef and cereals (barley). Tregnew_ Mr Nicholas Trefusis,250 acres, Beef,Sheep,Wool,cereals Churchtown_ Mr Fred Trenear,71.5 acres, dairy,sheep,wool,cereals Porloe _ Mr George Jefford,112 acres, Field vegtables
